content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Maria Mamani. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for asking, Mr. Heine. Considering the size of the apartment and its location, I believe a fair price would be around 600 Euros per month. Is this something that we can discuss?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: 600 Euros per month is an interesting offer. However, I'm looking to get the best deal for my property. Can you go higher?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mr. Heine. I'm also looking for the best deal as a student. Would you be willing to accept 620 Euros per month? This would be a good compromise for both of us.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: 620 Euros per month is closer to what I'm looking for. However, I think we can still do better. Can you offer a bit more?
name: Heinrich Heine
